explains: adv. 传统上；习惯上；传说上

sentences.en: The festival is traditionally held in May.
sentences.cn: 这个节日按照传统是在五月份过的。

sentences.en: Gold is traditionally a hedge against inflation.
sentences.cn: 黄金传统上是一种防范通货膨胀的手段。

sentences.en: Sons are traditionally expected to emulate their fathers.
sentences.cn: 传统上认为儿子应该效仿他们的父亲。
